name: Bird Barner!
description:
Fly through barns and avoid the birds!

On desktop, 'x' button is x and 'o' button is z. On mobile, there is a touch pad controller displayed.

Created in less than 72 hours with PICO-8. All music, graphics, code by me.

License: CC4-BY-NC-SA Open source code at: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=46486

Enjoy! Kill screen at 313 checkpoints :p
